item.title: Mind your object and shared object files!
item.description: Rcpp profoundly changed the R landscape. Basically, it made all performance bottlenecks vanish and I’m not surprised that so many packages are now using it: As of May 2017, 1026 packages on CRAN and a further 91 on BioConductor deploy Rcpp to extend R.
